title.rendered: Lion Star, Everest Place, and Paramount Announce Plans for Nickelodeon Hotels & Resorts Orlando, Opening in 2026

content.rendered:
Hotel to Feature Most Popular Nickelodeon Brands and Characters for an Immersive, Family-Friendly Experience

MIAMI, May 23, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Lion Star, Everest Place, and Paramount have unveiled their partnership to bring to life the much-anticipated Nickelodeon Hotels & Resorts Orlando in Kissimmee, Florida. Slated to open in 2026, this resort will be located in the Everest Place development and expertly operated by Lion Star Hospitality Inc., the exclusive US licensee for Karisma Hotels & Resorts, welcoming guests to explore a world of limitless fun and boundless opportunity.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lion-star-everest-place-and-paramount-announce-plans-for-nickelodeon-hotels–resorts-orlando-opening-in-2026-302154177.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

Slated to open in 2026, this resort will be located in the Everest Place […]
